TestCase.TestCase_Title: Delete variables in both adminstrator and user owned categories

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Create a "Category0" category within the "AdminContext" context
Create a variable "Variable0" within the "Category0" category
Create a variable "FileVariable0" of type FileVariable within the "Category0" category
Create a variable "FolderVariable0" of type FolderVariable within the "Category0" category
Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
Select the user mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "User"
Create a participation to the "AdminContext" administrator context called "Participation to AdminContext"
Create a "Category1" category within the "Participation to AdminContext" context
Create a variable "Variable0" within the "Category1" category
Create a variable "FileVariable0" of type FileVariable within the "Category1" category
Create a variable "FolderVariable0" of type FolderVariable within the "Category1" category
Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
Select the administrator mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "Administrator"
Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Click on the "Category0" category
In the variable viewer, select all variables
Right click on the "Variable0" variable and select "Delete"
Click on the "Yes" button to confirm deletion

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Delete" dialog box disappears. The "Category0" category is empty

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
Select the user mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "User"
Unfold the "Particiaption to AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Click on the "Category1" category
In the variable viewer, select all variables
Right click on the "Variable0" variable and select "Delete"
Click on the "Yes" button to confirm deletion

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Delete" dialog box disappears. The "Category1" category is empty

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Create a "Category0" category within the "AdminContext" context
Create a variable "Variable0" within the "Category0" category
Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
Create an administrator context called "InheritedAdminContext" with "AdminContext" as parent context and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Unfold the "InheritedAdminContext" context in the context viewer
Click on the "Category0" category
In the variable viewer, right click on the "Variable0" variable

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Delete" entry of the contextual menu is not available

TestCase.TestCase_Title: Cannot delete administrator variables in user mode

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Create a "Category0" category within the "AdminContext" context
Create a variable "Variable0" within the "Category0" category
Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
Select the user mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "User"
Create a participation to the "AdminContext" administrator context called "Participation to AdminContext"
Select the user mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "User"
Unfold the "Participation to AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Click on the "Category0" category
In the variable viewer, right click on the "Variable0" variable

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Delete" entry of the contextual menu is not available
